languages.text: "Зауэрбэк, как вы могли это допустить?! Покушение прямо в покоях под носом у охраны!" {n}Из горла Абеляра вырывается свирепый рык.{/n}

"Sauerback! How could you have let this happen? An assassination attempt upon the Rogue Trader, in {mf|his|her} own chambers, right under the noses of your enforcers?" {n}A fierce growl rumbles deep in Abelard's throat.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Зауэрбэк, как вы могли это допустить?! Покушение прямо в покоях под носом у охраны!" {n}Из горла Абеляра вырывается свирепый рык.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sauerback! How could you have let this happen? An attack on the Rogue Trader! In {mf|his|her} own chambers! And the enforcers were none the wiser!" {n}Abelard growls menacingly.{/n}
"Sauerback! How could you have let this happen? An attack on the Rogue Trader! In {mf|his|her} own chambers! And the enforcers were none the wiser!" {n}Abelard growls menacingly.{/n}

"Sauerback! How could you have let this happen? An assassination attempt upon the Rogue Trader, in {mf|his|her} own chambers, right under the noses of your enforcers?" {n}A fierce growl rumbles deep in Abelard's throat.{/n}

"Sauerback! How could you have let this happen? An assassination attempt upon the Rogue Trader, in {mf|his|her} own chambers, right under the noses of your enforcers?" {n}A fierce growl rumbles deep in Abelard's throat.{/n}

"Sauerback! How could you have let this happen? An assassination attempt upon the Rogue Trader, in {mf|his|her} own chambers, right under the noses of your enforcers?" {n}A fierce growl rumbles deep in Abelard's throat.{/n}

"Sauerback! How could you have let this happen? An assassination attempt upon the Rogue Trader, in {mf|his|her} own chambers, right under the noses of your enforcers?" {n}A fierce growl rumbles deep in Abelard's throat.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Sauerback! ¿Cómo ha permitido que ocurra esto? ¿Un intento de asesinato contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente en sus propias cámaras, en las narices de sus guardias?». {n}Un feroz gruñido retumba en la garganta de Abelard.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sauerback! How could you have let this happen? An assassination attempt upon the Rogue Trader, in {mf|his|her} own chambers, right under the noses of your enforcers?" {n}A fierce growl rumbles deep in Abelard's throat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Sauerback! ¿Cómo ha permitido que ocurra esto? ¿Un intento de asesinato contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente en sus propias cámaras, en las narices de sus guardias?». {n}Un feroz gruñido retumba en la garganta de Abelard.{/n}

languages.text: 「ザウアーバック！どうしてこんな状況を許した？お前たちエンフォーサーの目と鼻の先であるローグトレーダー自身の執務室で、暗殺未遂など？」{n}獰猛なうなり声がアベラルドの喉の奥から鳴り響く。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sauerback! How could you have let this happen? An assassination attempt upon the Rogue Trader, in {mf|his|her} own chambers, right under the noses of your enforcers?" {n}A fierce growl rumbles deep in Abelard's throat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ザウアーバック！どうしてこんな状況を許した？お前たちエンフォーサーの目と鼻の先であるローグトレーダー自身の執務室で、暗殺未遂など？」{n}獰猛なうなり声がアベラルドの喉の奥から鳴り響く。{/n}

languages.text: “苏尔贝克！你怎么会允许这种事情发生？有人打算暗杀行商浪人，就在{mf|他|她}本人的房间里，就在你那些执法者眼皮底下！这到底是怎么回事？”{n}阿贝拉德喉咙深处传来了恶狠狠的咆哮声。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sauerback! How could you have let this happen? An assassination attempt upon the Rogue Trader, in {mf|his|her} own chambers, right under the noses of your enforcers?" {n}A fierce growl rumbles deep in Abelard's throat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “苏尔贝克！你怎么会允许这种事情发生？有人打算暗杀行商浪人，就在{mf|他|她}本人的房间里，就在你那些执法者眼皮底下！这到底是怎么回事？”{n}阿贝拉德喉咙深处传来了恶狠狠的咆哮声。{/n}

languages.text: "Sauerback! Wie konntet Ihr das zulassen? Ein Mordanschlag auf {mf|den Freihändler in seinen|die Freihändlerin in ihren} eigenen Gemächern, direkt vor der Nase Eurer Enforcers?" {n}Ein wildes Knurren dringt tief aus Abelards Kehle.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sauerback! How could you have let this happen? An assassination attempt upon the Rogue Trader, in {mf|his|her} own chambers, right under the noses of your enforcers?" {n}A fierce growl rumbles deep in Abelard's throat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sauerback! Wie konntet Ihr das zulassen? Ein Mordanschlag auf {mf|den Freihändler in seinen|die Freihändlerin in ihren} eigenen Gemächern, direkt vor der Nase Eurer Enforcers?" {n}Ein wildes Knurren dringt tief aus Abelards Kehle.{/n}

languages.text: « Jocasta ! Comment avez-vous pu laisser faire une chose pareille ? Une tentative d'assassinat sur {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} dans ses propres appartements, au nez et à la barbe de vos prévôts ? »{n}La voix d'Abélard est plus proche d'un grognement féroce que d'une simple remontrance.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sauerback! How could you have let this happen? An assassination attempt upon the Rogue Trader, in {mf|his|her} own chambers, right under the noses of your enforcers?" {n}A fierce growl rumbles deep in Abelard's throat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Jocasta ! Comment avez-vous pu laisser faire une chose pareille ? Une tentative d'assassinat sur {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} dans ses propres appartements, au nez et à la barbe de vos prévôts ? »{n}La voix d'Abélard est plus proche d'un grognement féroce que d'une simple remontrance.{/n}

languages.text: "Sauerback! Bunun olmasına nasıl müsaade edebildin? Hür Tacir'e direkt olarak kendi odasında, infazcılarının burnunun dibinde suikast girişiminde bulunuldu!" {n}Abelard'ın boğazından oldukça derin, hiddetli bir hırıltı duyuluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sauerback! How could you have let this happen? An assassination attempt upon the Rogue Trader, in {mf|his|her} own chambers, right under the noses of your enforcers?" {n}A fierce growl rumbles deep in Abelard's throat.{/n}
